metadata.Title: CVE-2021-3838 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
[Unknown description]

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-3838` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

php-dompdf - 0.6.1+dfsg-2ubuntu1+esm1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: php-dompdf package in esm-apps/xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.6.1+dfsg-2ubuntu1+esm1').
